action.selector: [style="position: relative; display: inline-block; vertical-align: text-bottom; text-align: justify; height: 20px; width: 111px;"]
div[style="position: absolute; right: 40px; top: 200px; z-index: 0; width:154px;"]
div[style="   border-bottom: 1px #d4d4d4 solid; background-color: #fff;border-right: 1px #d4d4d4 solid;border-left: 1px #d4d4d4 solid;width: 179px;height:130px;margin: auto;"]

div[style=" height: 90px; background-color: #DDDDDD; border-radius:6px; width:978px; padding-top:8px; padding-bottom:8px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 8px; position: relative;"]
table[style^="direction: rtl; margin-bottom: 0px; width: 792px;"] td[style="padding-bottom: 10px; height: 150px;"][colspan="2"]

th[style="background: #505D6A; font-size: 13px; font-family: arial; text-align: left; color: white; font-weight: bold; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 10px; height: 31px; border-bottom: 1px solid white;"][colspan="9"]
